title: Representing the numerators symbolically
text: Use variables like A, B, C, etc. for the numerators and account for the increasing powers of the denominators
speech: Use variables like A, B, C, etc. for the numerators and account for the increasing powers of the denominators
pacedSpeech: Use variables like A, B, C, etc. for the numerators and account for the increasing powers of the denominators

title: Denominators
text: What would be the denominators of the decomposed factors?
speech: What would be the denominators of the decomposed factors?
pacedSpeech: What would be the denominators of the decomposed factors?

title: Using the definition of partial fraction decomposition
text: For each of the denominators in the decomposed form, give each numerator a symbolic label, like A, B, or C. For the term with the quadratic denominator, express the numerator as a linear expression like $$Ax+B$$.
speech: For each of the denominators in the decomposed form, give each numerator a symbolic label, like A, B, or C. For the term with the quadratic denominator, express the numerator as a linear expression like ,   a x plus   b .
pacedSpeech: For each of the denominators in the decomposed form, give each numerator a symbolic label, like A, B, or C. For the term with the quadratic denominator, express the numerator as a linear expression like  ,   a x plus   b

title: Remove the denominator
text: Multiply both sides by the common denominator. On the right side of the equation, expand and collect like terms.
speech: Multiply both sides by the common denominator. On the right side of the equation, expand and collect like terms.
pacedSpeech: Multiply both sides by the common denominator. On the right side of the equation, expand and collect like terms.

title: Finding the resulting equation
text: Expand the right side of the equation and collect like terms
speech: Expand the right side of the equation and collect like terms
pacedSpeech: Expand the right side of the equation and collect like terms

title: Setting up the system of equations
text: Set coefficients of like terms from the left side of the equation equal to those on the right side to create a system of equations to solve for the numerators
speech: Set coefficients of like terms from the left side of the equation equal to those on the right side to create a system of equations to solve for the numerators
